item.title: Elastic Stack
item.description: Intro The Elastic stack or ELK (Old nickname) is an open source set of tools that allow us to gather logs and metrics and visualize them. The main components of the include: Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana. Elastic Search is used to search, analyze, and store data. Logstash aggregates data into Elasticsearch. Kibana let’s use visualize our data. The stack also includes beats which are lightweight data shippers that point to either Elasticsearch or Logstash.
